bibl.title: Zeus dit not Commit Incest with his Mother. An Interpretation of Column XXVI of the Derveni Papyrus. Translated by Michael CHASE.
bibl.note: 1. Column XXVI of the Derveni Papyrus [P. Derveni (= M.-P.3 2465.1; LDAB 7049)]. - 2. Stoicism in the background of this interpretation.
BRISSON Luc, Zeus dit not Commit Incest with his Mother. An Interpretation of Column XXVI of the Derveni Papyrus. Translated by Michael CHASE.
